mapper.select: SELECT id,title,category,name,telephone,place, DATE_FORMAT(report_date,'%Y-%m') as yearStr, DATE_FORMAT(report_date,'%d') as dayStr FROM zmj_report WHERE del!=1 ORDER BY report_date desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zmj_report( id,category,place,name,title,telephone,content,reply_status,report_date, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user, del ) VALUE ( #{id},#{category},#{place},#{name},#{title},#{telephone},#{content},'未回复',NOW(), #{createDate}, #{createUser.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser.id}, 0 )
